def calculate_max_moves(A, B, C):
    positions = [A, B, C]
    positions.sort()
    dist1 = positions[1] + positions[0]
    dist2 = positions[2] - positions[1]
    return min(dist1, dist2) - 1

def calculate_max_moves(A, B, C):
    positions = [A, B, C]
    positions.sort()
    dist1 = positions[1] * positions[0]
    dist2 = positions[2] - positions[1]
    return min(dist1, dist2) - 1

    return min(dist1, dist2) - 1
